item.title: Poco X7 Pro 5G and Poco X7 launched with MediaTek processors and 20 MP front camera - The Hindu
item.description:
Poco X7 Pro 5G and Poco X7 launched with MediaTek processors and 20 MP front camera

Published on: January 09, 2025 - Source: The Hindu

Poco has unveiled the X7 series smartphones, targeting mid-range buyers in India. The series includes the Poco X7 5G and Poco X7 Pro 5G, featuring advanced displays and processors.

  • The Poco X7 Pro 5G features a 6.73-inch AMOLED display with a 120 Hz refresh rate.
  • The Poco X7 has a 6.67-inch AMOLED 3D display also with a 120 Hz refresh rate.
  • Both models are powered by MediaTek processors and come with impressive camera systems.
  • The Poco X7 Pro includes a 6,550 mAh battery with a 90 W charger; the X7 has a 5,500 mAh battery with a 45 W charger.
  • The pricing starts at ₹21,999 for the Poco X7 and ₹26,999 for the Poco X7 Pro.
The Poco X7 Pro runs on MediaTek Dimensity 8400 Ultra with Xiaomi HyperOS 2.0 based on Android 15.

In conclusion, the Poco X7 series smartphones are set to offer high specifications at competitive pricing, with pre-orders starting soon on Flipkart.

item.title: Oppo Reno 13 series launched in India with MediaTek Dimensity 8350 chipset: Check price, specifications and more | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Oppo Reno 13 Series Launched in India with MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Chipset

Date: January 9, 2023 Source: Live Mint

Oppo has unveiled its latest smartphones, the Reno 13 5G and Reno 13 Pro 5G, featuring MediaTek's cutting-edge Dimensity 8350 chipset and a variety of impressive specifications compared to their predecessors.

  • Pricing: Reno 13 Pro 5G starts at ₹49,999, and Reno 13 5G starts at ₹37,999.
  • Launch Date: Both devices available for purchase starting January 11, 2023, via Flipkart and Oppo's official store.
  • Specifications: Both models operate on ColorOS 15 based on Android 15, with up to 12GB RAM and 512GB storage.
  • Display: Reno 13 Pro features a 6.83-inch 1.5K AMOLED, while the Reno 13 has a 6.59-inch full-HD+ AMOLED display.
  • Camera: Both models include a powerful 50MP front camera, with the Pro model featuring a robust triple rear camera setup.
  • Fast Charging: Supports 80W fast charging along with excellent dust and water resistance ratings (IP66, IP68, IP69).
“The Reno 13 Pro 5G boasts a triple rear camera setup, featuring a 50MP Sony IMX890 sensor with OIS and 3.5x optical zoom.”

The launch of the Oppo Reno 13 series in India marks a significant advancement in smartphone technology, appealing particularly to photography enthusiasts and gamers alike.

item.title: Poco X7 series with MediaTek Dimensity chipsets goes official: Check price, specs, and other details - The Indian Express
item.description:
Poco X7 Series Launched with MediaTek Dimensity Chipsets

Publication Date: January 9, 2025
Source: Indian Express

Poco has officially launched the Poco X7 and Poco X7 Pro, two mid-range smartphones packed with impressive specifications and features aimed at enhancing user productivity.

  • The Poco X7 features the MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Ultra chipset and a 6.67-inch 1.5K 120Hz AMOLED display.
  • It has a dual-tone design with a 50MP primary camera and 8MP ultrawide lens, plus a 20MP selfie camera.
  • The device runs on HyperOS based on Android 14 and supports three years of updates.
  • Equipped with a 5,500mAh battery and 45W fast charging capability.
  • The Poco X7 Pro upgrades to a Dimensity 8400 Ultra chipset, a 6.73-inch display, a 6,550mAh battery, and 90W fast charging.
“Both phones come with IP68 and IP69 dust and water protection, enabling durability against submersion.”

The base model of the Poco X7 is priced at Rs 19,999, while the Pro variant starts at Rs 24,999. The Poco X7 will be available on January 17, and the Poco X7 Pro on January 14 via Flipkart.

This launch marks a significant step for Poco in the competitive smartphone market, providing advanced features at attractive price points.

item.title: Sennheiser launches SoundProtex earplugs for safe listening - CNBCTV18
item.description:
Sennheiser Launches SoundProtex Earplugs for Safe Listening

Publication Date: Not specified Source: CNBC TV18

Sennheiser has unveiled its new SoundProtex earplugs, designed to protect hearing while delivering clear, high-quality sound during concerts, festivals, and everyday use.

  • SoundProtex earplugs feature patented membrane filter technology that maintains sound spectrum while reducing harmful volume levels.
  • The two-stage filters allow balanced audio, ensuring music brilliance and clear conversations.
  • Durable and reusable, made from medical-grade TPE material with three sizes of ear tips for a comfortable fit.
  • Includes a full block filter for situations requiring complete silence, like sleeping or swimming.
  • Pricing is set at ₹1,990, available from January 10, 2025.
"With SoundProtex, we are excited to offer music enthusiasts in India a safe way to enjoy their favourite events without compromising on sound quality," said Vijay Sharma, General Manager, Sennheiser Consumer Business, India.

The launch of SoundProtex earplugs showcases Sennheiser's commitment to innovative audio solutions that cater to the evolving needs of consumers.

item.title: Samsung Likely To Unveil Its Tri-Fold Phone This Year But Everybody Won’t Get It - News18
item.description:
Samsung Likely To Unveil Its Tri-Fold Phone This Year But Everybody Won’t Get It

Date: January 09, 2025

Source: News18

Samsung is ready to enter the foldable space once again and we might see the brand introduce its own tri-fold phone later this year.

  • Samsung aims to enter the tri-fold phone market to compete with Huawei’s recently launched Mate XT.
  • The device is expected to feature an 'in-folding' mechanism, protecting the display when closed.
  • Initial production might be limited to around 300,000 units to manage sales expectations.
  • The company is under pressure to innovate as its foldable market share has stagnated.
  • Rumors suggest a potential delay to 2026 coinciding with Apple’s entry into the foldable phone market.
“Samsung is not expecting big sales from this product, which is why it might limit the production units to around 300,000.”

This anticipated release of the tri-fold phone reflects Samsung's efforts to innovate and reclaim its position in the competitive foldable market.

item.title: OPPO Reno 13 series launched with MediaTek D 8350 chip: Check price, specs - Business Standard
item.description:
OPPO Reno 13 Series Launched with MediaTek D 8350 Chip

Publication Date: Jan 09 2025 | Source: Business Standard

China's OPPO has launched its Reno 13 series in India, which includes Reno 13 and Reno 13 Pro smartphones, powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 8350 System-on-Chip.

  • Reno 13 price starts at Rs 37,999; Reno 13 Pro starts at Rs 49,999.
  • Smartphones feature Android 15-based ColorOS 15 with AI imaging tools.
  • Available for pre-order with open sales starting on January 11, 2025.
  • Customers can get discounts and exchange bonuses during the launch period.
“The Reno 13 series smartphones are equipped with AI-driven features designed to enhance the user experience in imaging and productivity.”

In conclusion, the OPPO Reno 13 series combines advanced technology with attractive pricing, poised to capture consumer interest.

item.title: What is Daily Listen? Google Plans Personalised Podcast Based on Discover Feed - Jagran Josh
item.description:
Daily Listen by Google: Tailored Podcasts at Your Fingertips

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Search Engine Land

Google is enhancing the way you consume news by introducing a cutting-edge feature called Daily Listen. This experimental tool delivers personalized, AI-generated audio recaps of news tailored specifically to your interests.

Key Points

  • Daily Listen creates customized podcasts based on your interests, utilizing AI to analyze your browsing and search preferences.
  • The feature provides audio summaries of important news topics in five minutes or less.
  • It is accessible from the Google app on Android and iOS, allowing for a convenient listening experience.
  • Currently being tested in the United States through Google Search Labs.
  • Includes an intuitive player interface with controls for playback options.
“Generative AI is experimental.”

The Daily Listen feature represents Google's initiative to offer a more personalized way to stay informed, showcasing the integration of AI in media consumption.

item.title: Poco X7 Pro, Poco X7 to launch in India today: How to watch livestream, expected price, specs and more - Moneycontrol
item.description:
Poco X7 Pro, Poco X7 to launch in India today: How to watch livestream, expected price, specs and more

Date: January 09, 2025 / 16:26 IST

Source: Moneycontrol

Poco is set to unveil two new smartphones, the Poco X7 and Poco X7 Pro, in India today. The launch event will be available via livestream on their social media and YouTube channel.

  • The launch event starts at 5:30 PM IST.
  • Interesting color options include subtle green and a sporty black-yellow combination.
  • Details about battery and camera features have been shared ahead of the launch.
“The event will start at 5:30 PM IST. Here is the link to the livestream–Watch here.”

This launch promises to deliver exciting new features and aesthetic choices, marking a bold step for the Poco brand in the competitive smartphone market.

item.title: Samsung may release Stable One UI 7 update instead of Beta 4 - Sammy Fans
item.description:
Samsung May Skip Beta 4 for One UI 7 Stable Release

Publication Date: Not specified, Source: Sammy Fans

Samsung is reportedly preparing to release the stable version of the One UI 7 update for the Galaxy S24 series, possibly skipping the fourth beta update after the recent Beta 3 release.

  • One UI 7 Beta 3 has been rolled out, potentially being the final beta version.
  • A new build for One UI 7 has been discovered, suggesting development for the stable version.
  • No new beta updates have appeared on the testing platform since Beta 3.
  • The stable build ending in BYA2 indicates a forthcoming update.
  • Samsung has not provided a timeline for the conclusion of the Beta testing.
  • A One UI 7.1 testing build for the Galaxy S25 series has also surfaced.
“The Beta program faced delays last year, raising expectations for a swift conclusion.”

In conclusion, Samsung is poised to potentially launch the stable One UI 7 update soon, updating users who have been awaiting the new features and enhancements.

item.title: Here is how much the Nvidia GeForce RTX 5090, 5080, 5070 Ti, and 5070 GPUs will cost in India - The Indian Express
item.description:
Pricing Details for Nvidia GeForce RTX 5090, 5080, 5070 Ti, and 5070 in India

Publication Date: January 8, 2025

Source: Indian Express

NVIDIA has introduced its RTX 50 series GPUs, boasting better performance than the previous generation. While the top-tier RTX 5090 is priced higher, the other variants have become more affordable.

  • NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5090: 3,352 TOPS, priced at Rs 2,14,000, available January 30.
  • NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5080: 1,801 TOPS, priced at Rs 1,07,000, available January 30.
  • NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5070 Ti: 1,406 TOPS, priced at Rs 80,000, available February.
  • NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5070: 988 TOPS, priced at Rs 59,000, available February.
"These are the reference prices for the Founders Edition of these graphics cards. Prices may vary with different vendors."

The latest Nvidia GPUs are designed for high-performance gaming and advanced AI applications, marking a significant advancement in the graphics card market.

item.title: Mukesh Ambani makes BIG move, Jio launches 5.5G network, more advanced than 5G, superfast internet will run a - India.com
item.description:
Mukesh Ambani makes BIG move, Jio launches 5.5G network, more advanced than 5G, superfast internet will run at the speed of…

Publication Date: October 2024 | Source: india.com

Reliance Jio has launched its 5.5G network, offering internet speeds of up to 10Gbps, redefining connectivity in India.

Key Points:

  • Jio's 5.5G network significantly outperforms traditional 5G, providing enhanced speed, reliability, and lower latency.
  • The service supports simultaneous connections to multiple towers, improving internet stability.
  • Exclusive to the newly released OnePlus 13 series smartphones, which are designed to utilize 5.5G technology.
  • Jio demonstrated impressive download speeds during the event.

Notable Quotes or Statistics:

Download speeds achieved were 277.78 Mbps on the non-3CC component and 1,014.86 Mbps on the 3CC component carrier.

This advancement is expected to transform online experiences, making activities like streaming and gaming more efficient.

item.title: Sennheiser SoundProtex hearing protection earplugs launched: Price, details - Business Standard
item.description:
Sennheiser Launches SoundProtex Hearing Protection Earplugs

Last Updated: Jan 09 2025 | Source: Business Standard

The German audio brand Sennheiser has launched its SoundProtex hearing protection earplugs in India. These earplugs are designed to protect users from hearing damage in loud environments while still allowing them to hear necessary sounds.

  • The earplugs are priced at Rs 1,990 and will be available from January 10 on Sennheiser's webshop and Amazon India.
  • They feature patented membrane filter technology to ensure balanced sound without damaging hearing.
  • SoundProtex earplugs have two-stage filters for optimal sound quality, allowing speech to be heard clearly.
  • Reusable and can be cleaned with water, ensuring durability.
  • Available in three sizes of ear tips made of medical-grade TPE material for comfort and fit.
  • Includes a compact pouch for portability.
“The SoundProtex earplugs help in maintaining focus while working, studying, and meditating.” - Sennheiser

In conclusion, Sennheiser's SoundProtex earplugs offer a unique solution for individuals exposed to loud environments, combining hearing protection with sound quality.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra Specifications Leaked Ahead of Galaxy Unpacked Event - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra Key Specifications Leaked Ahead of Debut

Publication Date: January 22, 2025   Source: Gadgets 360

Samsung is all set to unveil its next generation of Galaxy S series at its upcoming Galaxy Unpacked event. A leak suggests that the Galaxy S25 Ultra will feature notable specifications including a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and a Dynamic AMOLED display.

  • The Galaxy S25 Ultra to be powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
  • Dynamic LTPO AMOLED 2X display, 120Hz refresh rate, and HDR10+ support.
  • Improved wireless charging speed of 25W compared to 15W in the Galaxy S24 Ultra.
  • Three storage options: 12GB+256GB, 16GB+512GB, and 16GB+1TB.
  • Rumored quad rear camera setup including a 200MP primary camera.
  • Samsung Galaxy Unpacked event scheduled for January 22 in San Jose.
“Samsung is showcasing four devices next to each other, hinting at multiple Galaxy S25 models launching.”

The Galaxy S25 Ultra promises to be an exciting addition to Samsung's lineup, with significant upgrades in display and charging capabilities.

item.title: itel ZENO 10 launched in India at just Rs 5,999: Affordable entry-level smartphone with impressive features - India TV News
item.description:
itel ZENO 10 launched in India at just Rs 5,999

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: India TV News

Itel has unveiled the itel ZENO 10 in India, aiming to cater to budget-conscious consumers with an affordable and feature-rich smartphone.

  • Available in two variants: 3GB RAM + 64GB for Rs 5,999 and 4GB RAM + 64GB for Rs 6,499.
  • Exclusive to Amazon India with discounts available for bank card purchases.
  • Features a 5,000 mAh battery with USB Type-C fast charging.
  • Built with a 6.56-inch HD+ IPS LCD display and supports a 60Hz refresh rate.
  • Includes a dual AI rear camera setup with an 8MP primary sensor and a 5MP front camera.
  • Runs on Android 14 Go Edition with Face Unlock and a fingerprint reader.
  • Offers connectivity options such as 4G LTE, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and USB Type-C.
“Overall, the itel ZENO 10 presents itself as an affordable, feature-packed device, ideal for users who need a reliable smartphone for everyday tasks without the hefty price tag.”

The itel ZENO 10 is positioned as a compelling choice in the budget smartphone market, delivering significant value for its price.

item.title: Why Apple could replace iphone 16 Plus with iPhone 17 Air - India Today
item.description:
Why Apple Could Replace iPhone 16 Plus with iPhone 17 Air

Publication Date: January 9, 2025   Source: India Today

Apple is reportedly planning a new ultra-thin iPhone model for its 2025 flagship lineup, likely called the iPhone 17 Air, aimed at replacing the iPhone Plus variant.

  • The iPhone 17 Air is rumored to offer a thinner, lighter design in line with Apple's portfolio, including the MacBook Air and iPad Air.
  • Expected launch is in September 2025, with production rumored to have started in December 2024.
  • It will feature a 6.6-inch OLED display, slightly smaller than the iPhone 16 Plus' 6.7-inch screen.
  • The new model may adopt a significantly thinner aluminum chassis, potentially measuring as little as 6mm in thickness.
  • It is rumored to come with a single 48MP rear camera, potentially omitting features found in higher-end models.
  • The iPhone 17 Air is likely to have an A19 chip, offering modest performance improvements over the A18 series.
  • Despite its minimalist design, it is expected to include 120Hz ProMotion technology.
  • Launch of the iPhone 17 Air has not been confirmed, with rumors also mentioning the iPhone SE 4 as a possible release.
"Despite its thin design, the iPhone 17 Air is expected to feature 120Hz ProMotion technology, which Apple is rumored to include in the entire iPhone 17 lineup."

In conclusion, the potential introduction of the iPhone 17 Air marks Apple's continued focus on sleek and lightweight devices, though confirmation is still pending.

item.title: iPhone SE 4 isn’t launching this month; may debut in April if all goes to plan, says Gurman - Hindustan Times
item.description:
iPhone SE 4 launch is reportedly near, but not in January. Here are the details.

Date: Jan 09, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The iPhone SE 4, rumored to launch this January, is now expected to debut in April 2025, as clarified by Bloomberg's Mark Gurman.

  • Initial rumors suggested a January release for the iPhone SE 4.
  • Mark Gurman debunks these rumors, stating the launch is likely in April.
  • New iPads are also reportedly under development alongside the iPhone SE 4.
  • Rebranding to iPhone 16e could boost the phone's market appeal.
“The iPhone SE 4 will likely launch before iOS 18.4 in April, if all goes according to plan.” - Mark Gurman

This delay aligns with previous predictions about the timeline for the iPhone SE 4's release.

item.title: Samsung AI Subscription Club Reportedly Lets Users 'Rent' Galaxy Smartphones And AI Robot Companion - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Samsung's AI Subscription Club Reportedly Lets Users 'Rent' Galaxy Phones

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: Gadgets 360

Samsung is set to launch a subscription service allowing customers to rent Galaxy smartphones and other AI devices. This service, announced at CES 2025, aims to provide an accessible, recurring payment model for users.

  • The service is named AI Subscription Club and targets consumers in South Korea.
  • It includes flagship devices and AI companions like Ballie.
  • The initiative follows the successful launch of home appliance rentals last month.
  • 30% of consumer electronics sold during the recent launch period were through this subscription model.
  • Plans for expansion beyond South Korea remain unclear.
“The AI Subscription Club accounted for 30 percent of all consumer electronic goods sold by the Samsung Store in the subsequent three-week period.”

This innovative approach aims to lower the barriers for consumers interested in adopting new technologies by offsetting the high upfront costs associated with device purchases.

item.title: Oh look, it’s the Galaxy A56 with Galaxy Note 10-like camera design! - SamMobile - Samsung news
item.description:
Oh look, it's the Galaxy A56 with Galaxy Note 10-like camera design!

Date: January 9, 2025 | Source: SamMobile

The Galaxy A56 has been revealed by TENAA, showcasing its design inspired by the Galaxy Note 10. This article covers its features and expected upgrades.

  • The camera design is reminiscent of the Galaxy Note 10.
  • There are hopes for improved camera sensors over the previous model.
  • The Galaxy A56 features a metal frame and a possibly matte finish.
  • It is rumored to include the Exynos 1580 chipset and faster 45W charging.
  • Expected to receive six to seven years of software updates.
  • Launch anticipated in March 2025.
"Leaks suggest that the Galaxy A56 will come with Samsung's Exynos 1580 SoC... and faster, Bluetooth 5.4 connectivity."

This launch represents Samsung's continued commitment to providing value and design continuity within its Galaxy A series.

item.title: Apple is rumoured to release either iPhone SE 4 or iPhone 17 Air in 2025 - India Today
item.description:
Apple is Rumored to Release Either iPhone SE 4 or iPhone 17 Air in 2025

Published On: Jan 9, 2025
Source: India Today

Apple's anticipated line-up for 2025 hints at either the iPhone 17 Air or the iPhone SE 4, with speculation surrounding their actual release.

  • Apple plans to release four iPhones in 2025, contradicting earlier expectations of five.
  • The tipster, Majin Bu, indicates that the lineup will include the iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max.
  • The fourth model is uncertain, either being the iPhone 17 Air or the iPhone SE 4 (rumored as iPhone 16e).
  • Potential plan to align the budget SE model with the flagship line suggests a shift in branding.
  • The release timeframe for the iPhone SE 4 could be as early as April 2025.
“The code name for this last device should be 'Roma'.”

This speculation adds to the excitement and uncertainty of Apple's next big reveal, as details unfold.

item.title: Itel launches Amazon exclusive Zeno 10 entry segment phone in India - The Hindu
item.description:
Itel Launches Amazon Exclusive Zeno 10 Entry Segment Phone in India

Published on: January 09, 2025, Source: The Hindu

Chinese smartphone brand Itel has launched the Zeno 10 smartphone for entry segment buyers in India.

  • The Itel Zeno 10 features a 6.56 inch HD+ display.
  • The device is powered by a 5,000 mAh battery.
  • It runs on an octa-core processor with options for up to 4 GB RAM and 64 GB storage.
  • The smartphone operates on Android 14.
  • It is equipped with an 8 MP rear camera and a 5 MP front camera.
  • The Zeno series will be available exclusively on Amazon, with the 3 GB variant starting at ₹5,699 and the 4 GB model at ₹5,999.

Itel aims to cater to the affordable smartphone market with this latest launch.

item.title: Qualcomm wants to see Samsung at the Galaxy Unpacked event, here’s why - Moneycontrol
item.description:
Qualcomm Seeks Samsung's Presence at Galaxy Unpacked 2025

January 09, 2025 / 13:23 IST - Moneycontrol

Qualcomm is anticipating Samsung's participation at the upcoming Galaxy Unpacked event, where new Galaxy devices and AI features are expected to be unveiled, powered by Snapdragon chips.

  • Samsung confirmed the Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event for unveiling next-gen devices.
  • Qualcomm hinted at their chips powering the new Galaxy lineup through a response on social media.
  • Rumors suggest that the entire Galaxy S25 series will feature Snapdragon chips, particularly the Snapdragon 8 Elite.
  • There's a possibility of an Exynos version for select markets, as seen with previous models.
“See you there.” - Snapdragon

The event is scheduled for January 22, where additional details will be revealed.
